headlines.shortLinkText: Manchester City held to 1-1 draw at Wolves

headlines.description: Bournemouth fought back from two goals down to earn a 2-2 draw with Everton as both teams ended with 10 men.
headlines.shortLinkText: Richarlison sees red, Everton held by Bournemouth

headlines.description: Arsenal celebrated their first Premier League win of the season under new manager Unai Emery after coming from behind to beat West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Emery gets first Arsenal win, 3-1 vs. West Ham

headlines.description: Huddersfield Town survived Jonathan Hogg's sending off to claim their first Premier League point of the season after a 0-0 draw against Cardiff.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huddersfield, Cardiff still winless after draw

headlines.description: Defender Harry Maguire's stoppage-time goal gave Leicester City a hard-fought 2-1 Premier League victory over 10-man Southampton on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester win at Saints after Maguire strike
Salah scores as Liverpool edge past Brighton
